acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

addPriceProxy(address).details: Only owner can call this                             The price proxy is an encapsulation of third-party oracle price retrieval methods                             You can obtain the prices of inputToken/outputToken from price proxy

params._priceProxy: The address of the price proxy

params._pairName: The price pair name (e.g. CORE/USDT  BTC/USDT)

params._acceptableDelay: Maximum acceptable delay for data given from Oracles
params._earnStrategy: The address of the earn strategy contract
params._earnWrappedToken: The address of the earn wrapped token (STCORE) contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

params._priceProxy: The address of the price proxy

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._priceProxy: The address of the price proxy

setAcceptableDelay(uint256).details: If oracle data has not been updated for a while,                             we will consider the price as invalid

params._earnStrategy: The address of the earn strategy contract

params._earnWrappedToken: The address of the earn wrapped token (STCORE) contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

addTokenPricePair(address,string).notice: Adds mapping between token and price pair

constructor.notice: This contract is used to get relative price of two assets from available oracles

equivalentOutputAmount(uint256,uint256,u.notice: Finds amount of output token that has equal value                                 as the input amount of the input token from oracle

getPriceProxyListLength().notice: Getter for the length of oracle list

pauseOracle().notice: Pause the oracle, so only the functions can be called which are whenPaused

selectBestPriceProxy(address).notice: Selects a price proxy as the preferred one

setAcceptableDelay(uint256).notice: Sets acceptable delay for oracle responses

setEarnStrategy(address).notice: Sets the earn strategy contract address

setEarnWrappedToken(address).notice: Sets the earn wrapped token (STCORE) contract address

unPauseOracle().notice: Un-pause the oracle, so only the functions can be called which are whenNotPaused
